name: Wild Deer Hunt Jungle Sniper
storyline: Brace yourself for the exotic combination of deer hunting games 2017!
summary:
Become hunters of wild deer with sniper hunting jungle animal in this action packed hunting adventure, where you will play as a real huntsman that will go wilder in search of deer hunt and other jungle animals.
Wild Deer Hunt Jungle Sniper is an amazing realistic & exotic animal and deer hunting where you will be tested as huntsman. Your shooting and sniping skills will also be tested with 3d Jungle sniper hunting. It's time to grab your weapons and test your sniper skills but don't let the deer and other jungle animals to escape!
